org.jetel.connection.jdbc

Class AutoKeyGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.AutoKeyGenerator

  • public class AutoKeyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for filling output record by keys got from database.
    Since:
    Jun 13, 2007
